hymn.title: Work, for the night is coming

layout.singingstanza: Work, for the night is com -- ing, Work through the morn -- ing hours; Work while the dew is spark -- ling, Work 'mid spring -- ing flowers; Work when the day grows bright -- er, Work in the glow -- ing sun; Work, for the night is com -- ing, When man's work is done.

lyrics.stanza: Work, for the night is coming, Work through the sunny noon; Fill brightest hours with labor, Rest comes sure and soon. Give every flying minute, Something to keep in store; Work, for the night is coming, When man works no more.

Work, for the night is coming, Under the sunset skies; While their bright tints are glowing, Work, for daylight flies. Work till the last beam fadeth, Fadeth to shine no more; Work, while the night is darkening, When man's work is o'er.
